metadata.name: SAMSARA
metadata.description:
To you, who live with life on fire
Your trajectory will be engraved on your soul.

The world you see in front of you now is very small.
Even if it is bitter and steep
It will come and go, and it will feed you.
Keep your eyes peeled for the small miracles that will come your way.
There is always salvation.

To those of you who live your lives on fire until the very end
May happy light fall on you.



命を燃やし生きる貴方へ
貴方の軌跡は魂へと刻まれる

今、目の前に見えている世界はとても狭く、
苦く険しいものであったとしても
巡り巡り貴方の糧となるでしょう。
降り注ぐ小さな奇跡を見逃さぬよう、よく目を凝らしてし下さい。
救いは必ずあるのだから。

最期のその時まで命を燃やす貴方へ
幸福な光を与えられますように。
